page.title: 16TRADE - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: {NORTH TAWTON MARKET A{cattle market}is held in North Tawton on{alternate Thursdays,}calves, sheep,and fat and store cattle being bought and sold. There is also a{collective sale}of antiques, modern furniture, porcelain, and china etc. which is held on the {first Wednesday in each month.} The site of the{market}has moved in recent years.It was originally held in the centre of the town on a site now occupied by the Town Hall before being moved to the Railway Station and latterly to the lower end of the town opposite the Copper Key Inn. {GREGORY'S TRANSPORT A large heavy haulage and warehousing company based in North Tawton carrying mainly dried milk products, animal feed and fertilizers throughout the Westcountry and U.K.
